hopobject.name: Prototyping Expansion Board
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.3) Gecko/20100401 Firefox/3.6.3 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body:
The Trainer board is a expansion / breakout board for the BeagleBoard that provides the following interfaces:

* I2C interface (level translated to 3.3V or 5V)
* SPI interface (level translated to 3.3V)
* multiple GPIO's (level translated to 3.3V)
* standard 0.1" x 0.1" prototyping area
* Arduino compatible ATmega328 processor (user selected jumper to run at 3.3V or 5V)
* BeagleBoard can communicate to the ATmega328 processor via its second serial port
* BeagleBoard can control the power to the ATmega328 processor

The Trainer board attaches to the BeagleBoard via the expansion connector. The board connects to the back of the BeagleBoard and is the same physical size: 3.1" x 3.0".

Contact = rusty@tincantools.com
hopobject.shortdesc: The Trainer board is an expansion / breakout board for the BeagleBoard that provides level translated interfaces for: I2C, SPI, multiple GPIO's, standard prototyping area, Arduino compatible ATmega328.
